title: i want the replay of this old game

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

replies.body: Damn, it sucks to say this but right now replays only work on the current patch.  Once a new patch goes live, any older replays will become unavailable.  Per the [replay guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips), you'll want to create highlights of moments you want to keep.  I know that won't help get the older replay back, but I hope it can for future instances.  Hope this helps!
